devdoc.author: Stefan George - <stefan@gnosis.pm>Richard Meissner - <richard@gnosis.pm>Andrew Redden - <andrew@groundhog.network> - removed delegate proxy as its being populated with a setup function now.
devdoc.title: Paying Proxy - Generic proxy contract allows to execute all transactions applying the code of a master contract. It is possible to send along initialization data with the constructor. And sends funds after creation to a specified account.
